com.chrisfoxleyevans.SCC311.Auction.Server.Interfaces

Interface IServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface IServer
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This interface provides the definition for the methods that the Server class will implement
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Chris Foxley-Evans

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bid closeAuction(int auctionID, int clientID)
      This method is invoked by the client to close an auction

      This method is invoked by the client to register an auction

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveAuctions

        java.util.ArrayList<Auction> getActiveAuctions()
                                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is invoked by the client to get a list of the current active auctions
        Returns:
        Return and ArrayList of Auctions
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a Remote Exception if there is an issue completing the method or if the server is currently hosting no auctions

      • registerAuction

        int registerAuction(int clientID,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  double reservePrice,
                  double startPrice)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is invoked by the client to register an auction
        Parameters:
        clientID - The ID of the client that is registering the auction
        description - The description of the item that the client is registering
        reservePrice - The reserve price of the item that the client is registering
        startPrice - The starting price of the item that the client is registering
        Returns:
        Returns an integer with the registered items AuctionID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a Remote Exception if there is an issue completing the method or if the server is unable to register the bid

      • registerBid

        java.lang.Boolean registerBid(int auctionID,
                            int clientID,
                            java.lang.String username,
                            double bidValue)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is invoked by the client to register a bid on an item
        Parameters:
        clientID - The ID of the client that is registering the bid
        auctionID - The ID of the auction that the client is bidding on
        username - The username of the client
        bidValue - The value of the bid that the client is registering
        Returns:
        Returns true if the bid was registered successfully
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a Remote Exception if there is an issue completing the method or if the bid is unable to be registerd

      • closeAuction

        Bid closeAuction(int auctionID,
               int clientID)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is invoked by the client to close an auction
        Parameters:
        auctionID - The of the auction that the client wishes to close
        clientID - The ID of the client that wishes to close the auction
        Returns:
        Returns a bid object that contains the details of the winning bid
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Throws a remote exception if there is an issue completing the method or if the high bid is below the items reserve
